marklogic.body: To Kieth Obamamann: . . . Moscow TV called. . . They said if you can tone down the hate and extremism they may have a slot in their comrade station in Siberia for you. . . They aparently overheard you saying "it would be a Cold day in hell before you'd quit your lying !" . . . Well bucko, there's the hell you wanted and from what I hear it's Always Cold. . . I'd like to take this time to wish you good luck in your new endeavor ! . . That is, I'd LIKE to but I just can't 'cause I'm happy as hell you were fired ! . . . . . Oh!, by the way, they said be sure when you come in for the interview to bring your BIRTH CERTIFICATE and see Comrade Ibin Bietenov, as they are sure you two will have a lot in common.
